revised_title: Advancements in High-Pressure and High-Temperature Research for Understanding Earth's Deep Interior
tldr: This collection of papers and discussions from a Royal Society meeting highlights advancements in high-pressure and high-temperature research, focusing on understanding the Earth's deep interior. Topics covered include experimental techniques, seismology, dynamics, and mantle and core chemistry. The meeting aimed to showcase the current state of experimental achievements and their implications for understanding the Earth's interior.
